headline: 3 Reasons to Avoid HII and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: Huntington Ingalls’s stock price has taken a beating over the past six months, shedding 20.7% of its value and falling to $206.40 per share. This was partly driven by its softer quarterly results and might have investors contemplating their next move.
